mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT group_id, g.`name`, introduction, tt.institution_id, paper_id , latestpaperCount, latestsci, latestei, latestcnki , COUNT(DISTINCT paper_id) AS paperCount , SUM(IFNULL(in_sci, 0)) AS sci , SUM(IFNULL(in_ei, 0)) AS ei , SUM(IFNULL(in_cnki, 0)) AS cnki , SUM(IFNULL(sci_refer, 0)) AS sciRefer , SUM(IFNULL(ei_refer, 0)) AS eiRefer , SUM(IFNULL(cnki_refer, 0)) AS cnkiRefer , SUM(IFNULL(sci_refer, 0)) + SUM(IFNULL(ei_refer, 0)) + SUM(IFNULL(cnki_refer, 0)) AS referCount FROM ( SELECT t.group_id, t.institution_id, ai.author_id, paper_id, latestpaperCount , latestsci, latestei, latestcnki FROM ( SELECT group_id, ai.institution_id AS institution_id, COUNT(DISTINCT ai.author_id) AS authorCount , COUNT(*) AS latestpaperCount , SUM(IFNULL(in_sci, 0)) AS latestsci , SUM(IFNULL(in_ei, 0)) AS latestei , SUM(IFNULL(in_cnki, 0)) AS latestcnki FROM author_institution ai, paper_author_institution pai, paper p WHERE pai.institution_id = 1 AND ai.institution_id = pai.institution_id AND ai.author_id = pai.author_id AND pai.paper_id = p.id AND DATE_FORMAT(p.pubdate, '%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 90 DAY), '%Y%m%d') GROUP BY group_id ORDER BY latestpaperCount DESC LIMIT 6 ) t left join author_institution ai on ai.group_id = t.group_id left join paper_author_institution pai on ai.institution_id = pai.institution_id WHERE ai.institution_id = 1 AND ai.group_id = t.group_id AND ai.institution_id = pai.institution_id AND ai.author_id = pai.author_id GROUP BY t.group_id, paper_id ) tt left join `group` g on tt.group_id = g.id left join paper p on tt.paper_id = p.id WHERE tt.group_id = g.id AND tt.paper_id = p.id GROUP BY tt.group_id ORDER BY latestpaperCount DESC ) temp_table left join author_institution ai on temp_table.group_id = ai.group_id left join author a on a.id=ai.author_id WHERE ai.institution_id = 1 AND temp_table.group_id = ai.group_id;
